channel.title: Danation And then Items
channel.description:
Hey,
On my server i have a donation systeem if some one donates he can ask for stuff or stats but now i want to that if the donate they get code and type it in game then they get the requested items or stats
does some one know how to do that ?
plz some one if you know the code send it to me ?
tyvm !!
M.M[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2009, 09:25:33 am[/size][hr]Some one help plz ?
